title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: The updating of checkboxes when selecting multiple files to export should display a busy cursor while the operation is in progress.
OB: When I select multiple files to export in the table, it takes a long time (around 30 seconds in my case) for the checkboxes to update their checked state. Currently, no busy cursor is shown during this process.
EB: When I select multiple files to export in the table, the checkboxes should update their checked state relatively quickly. A busy cursor should be displayed during this process to indicate that the operation is in progress.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature. 
2. Select multiple files in the table to export. 
3. Observe the updating of the checkboxes and check if a busy cursor is displayed.
